languages.text: "Ты прав{mf||а}. Ты {d|Encyclopedia:CompArgenta_SupportedMeek}тысячу раз{/d} прав{mf||а}, Вольный Торговец! Я раскаиваюсь, и я искуплю свои ошибки. Идем же!"

traits.locale_text: "Ты прав{mf||а}. Ты тысячу раз прав{mf||а}, Вольный Торговец! Я раскаиваюсь, и я искуплю свои ошибки. Идем же!"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "You're right. You're {d|Encyclopedia:CompArgenta_SupportedMeek}a thousand times{/d} right, Rogue Trader! I feel remorse, and I will atone for my mistakes. Come!"
languages.original_text: "Ты прав{mf||а}. Ты {d|Encyclopedia:CompArgenta_SupportedMeek}тысячу раз{/d} прав{mf||а}, Вольный Торговец! Я раскаиваюсь, и я искуплю свои ошибки. Идем же!"

traits.locale_text: "You're right. You're a thousand times right, Rogue Trader! I feel remorse, and I will atone for my mistakes. Come!"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "You're right. You're a thousand times right, Rogue Trader! I feel remorse, and I will atone for my mistakes. Come!"

traits.locale_text: "You're right. You're a thousand times right, Rogue Trader! I feel remorse, and I will atone for my mistakes. Come!"

traits.locale_text: "You're right. You're a thousand times right, Rogue Trader! I feel remorse, and I will atone for my mistakes. Come!"

traits.locale_text: "You're right. You're {d|Encyclopedia:CompArgenta_SupportedMeek}a thousand times{/d} right, Rogue Trader! I feel remorse, and I will atone for my mistakes. Come!"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: 「そう。御身は{d|Encyclopedia:CompArgenta_SupportedMeek}いつだって{/d}正しいのだ、自由開拓者！我は後悔しています。そして我の過ちを償おうと思う。さあ！」
languages.original_text: "You're right. You're {d|Encyclopedia:CompArgenta_SupportedMeek}a thousand times{/d} right, Rogue Trader! I feel remorse, and I will atone for my mistakes. Come!"

traits.locale_text: 「そう。御身は{d|Encyclopedia:CompArgenta_SupportedMeek}いつだって{/d}正しいのだ、自由開拓者！我は後悔しています。そして我の過ちを償おうと思う。さあ！」
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: “你说得没错，你的话{d|Encyclopedia:CompArgenta_SupportedMeek}实在是太有道理了{/d}，行商浪人！我已经感觉到了悔恨，我决心弥补过去的错误！快来吧！”
languages.original_text: "You're right. You're {d|Encyclopedia:CompArgenta_SupportedMeek}a thousand times{/d} right, Rogue Trader! I feel remorse, and I will atone for my mistakes. Come!"

traits.locale_text: “你说得没错，你的话实在是太有道理了，行商浪人！我已经感觉到了悔恨，我决心弥补过去的错误！快来吧！”
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: « Non, Vous avez {d|Encyclopedia:CompArgenta_SupportedMeek}mille fois{/d} raison, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande} ! Je suis rongée par le remords, et j'ai bien l'intention de racheter mes fautes. En route ! »
languages.original_text: "You're right. You're {d|Encyclopedia:CompArgenta_SupportedMeek}a thousand times{/d} right, Rogue Trader! I feel remorse, and I will atone for my mistakes. Come!"

traits.locale_text: « Vous avez raison. Vous avez mille fois raison, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande} ! Je suis rongée par le remords, et j'ai bien l'intention de racheter mes fautes. En route ! »
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: «Tiene razón. ¡{d|Encyclopedia:CompArgenta_SupportedMeek}Vaya si la tiene{/d}, Comerciante Independiente! Me arrepiento y expiaré mis errores. ¡Vamos!».
languages.original_text: "You're right. You're {d|Encyclopedia:CompArgenta_SupportedMeek}a thousand times{/d} right, Rogue Trader! I feel remorse, and I will atone for my mistakes. Come!"

traits.locale_text: «Tiene razón. ¡Vaya si la tiene, Comerciante Independiente. Me arrepiento y expiaré mis errores. ¡Vamos!».
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Ihr habt recht. Ihr habt {d|Encyclopedia:CompArgenta_SupportedMeek}tausendfach{/d} recht, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}! Ich spüre Reue, und ich werde meine Fehler wiedergutmachen. Kommt!"
languages.original_text: "You're right. You're {d|Encyclopedia:CompArgenta_SupportedMeek}a thousand times{/d} right, Rogue Trader! I feel remorse, and I will atone for my mistakes. Come!"

traits.locale_text: "Ihr habt recht. Ihr habt tausendfach recht, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}! Ich spüre Reue, und ich werde meine Fehler wiedergutmachen. Kommt!"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Haklısın. Hem de {d|Encyclopedia:CompArgenta_SupportedMeek}binlerce kez{/d} haklısın Hür Tacir! Çok nadimim, hatalarımı telafi edeceğim. Gel!"
languages.original_text: "You're right. You're {d|Encyclopedia:CompArgenta_SupportedMeek}a thousand times{/d} right, Rogue Trader! I feel remorse, and I will atone for my mistakes. Come!"

traits.locale_text: "Haklısın. Hem de {d|Encyclopedia:CompArgenta_SupportedMeek}binlerce kez{/d} haklısın Hür Tacir! Nedamet hissediyorum ve hatalarımı telafi edeceğim. Gel!"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion
